DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate effect two antidepression medication sexual functioning .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Of Antidepressants On Sexual Functioning In Adults
DOC.criteria: Primary diagnosis Major Depressive Disorder ( MDD ) current duration last 12 week great 2 year . Subjects must engage sexual activity lead orgasm least every two week . Subject must normal orgasmic function willing discus investigator . Subjects arousal orgasm dysfunction . Has previously fail respond two adequate trial antidepressant past 2 year . Subject unstable medical disorder . Subject positive urine test illicit drug use screening .
DOC.keyword: depression , sexual dysfunction , orgasm disorder , MDD
